statements: SELECT * FROM policy_monitoring;
SELECT policy_id, policy_name, compliance_status FROM policy_monitoring WHERE compliance_status = 'Compliant';
SELECT regulation_type, land_use_policy FROM policy_monitoring ORDER BY regulation_type DESC;
SELECT policy_name, conservation_initiative FROM policy_monitoring WHERE conservation_initiative = 'Environmental';
SELECT policy_id, policy_name, land_use_policy FROM policy_monitoring WHERE land_use_policy LIKE '%urban%';
SELECT policy_name, regulation_type FROM policy_monitoring WHERE compliance_status = 'Compliant';
SELECT * FROM policy_monitoring WHERE regulation_type = 'Environmental Regulations' ORDER BY policy_id DESC;
SELECT policy_name, land_use_policy FROM policy_monitoring WHERE compliance_status = 'Non-Compliant' AND conservation_initiative = 'Green Initiatives';
SELECT policy_name, regulation_type, compliance_status FROM policy_monitoring WHERE regulation_type LIKE '%Regulations%' ORDER BY policy_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM policy_monitoring WHERE compliance_status = 'Compliant' OR compliance_status = 'Non-Compliant' ORDER BY policy_id ASC, policy_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM policy_makers;
SELECT name, email FROM policy_makers WHERE organization = 'Company A';
SELECT policy_maker_id, regulation_area, compliance_status FROM compliance_monitoring WHERE inspection_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, name, email, organization FROM policy_makers ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM compliance_monitoring WHERE compliance_status = 'Non-Compliant' ORDER BY inspection_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM policy_makers WHERE organization = 'ABC Corp' ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, email, organization FROM policy_makers WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5);

SELECT p.*, c.regulation_area, c.compliance_status FROM policy_makers p JOIN compliance_monitoring c ON p.id = c.policy_maker_id WHERE c.compliance_status = 'Non-Compliant' ORDER BY c.inspection_date DESC;

SELECT pm.name AS PolicyMakerName, cm.regulation_area AS Area, cm.inspection_date AS InspectionDate FROM policy_makers pm JOIN compliance_monitoring cm ON pm.id = cm.policy_maker_id WHERE cm.inspection_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT pm.*, cm.* FROM policy_makers pm LEFT JOIN compliance_monitoring cm ON pm.id = cm.policy_maker_id WHERE cm.compliance_status IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM policy_makers ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, title FROM policy_makers WHERE organization = 'ABC Inc.';
SELECT * FROM agricultural_regulations WHERE compliance_status = TRUE ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT initiative_name, end_date FROM conservation_initiatives WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT id, regulation_name FROM agricultural_regulations WHERE description LIKE '%environment%';
SELECT * FROM policy_makers ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT id, organization FROM policy_makers WHERE title = 'CEO';
SELECT initiative_name, start_date, end_date FROM conservation_initiatives WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM policy_makers WHERE organization LIKE '%gov%';
SELECT regulation_name, description FROM agricultural_regulations WHERE compliance_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM policy_makers;
SELECT id, name FROM policy_makers ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM agricultural_regulations WHERE description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT id, regulation_name FROM agricultural_regulations WHERE id = 3;
SELECT * FROM land_use_policies WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM policy_makers;
SELECT id, name, organization FROM policy_makers WHERE organization = 'Government';
SELECT * FROM agricultural_regulations WHERE description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT id, regulation_name FROM agricultural_regulations ORDER BY regulation_name DESC;
SELECT policy_name, start_date, end_date FROM land_use_policies WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM PolicyMakers;
SELECT id, name, email FROM PolicyMakers ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM AgriculturalRegulations WHERE description LIKE '%environment%';
SELECT id, policy_name FROM LandUsePolicies WHERE policy_maker_id = 3;
SELECT initiative_name, description FROM ConservationInitiatives WHERE policy_maker_id = 1 ORDER BY initiative_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM PolicyMakers;
SELECT name, email FROM PolicyMakers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM AgriculturalRegulations WHERE description LIKE '%environment%';
SELECT initiative_name, description FROM ConservationInitiatives WHERE policy_maker_id = 2 ORDER BY initiative_name DESC;

SELECT p.name AS PolicyMaker, c.record_date AS Date, a.regulation_name AS Regulation FROM PolicyMakers p JOIN AgriculturalRegulations a ON p.id = a.policy_maker_id JOIN ComplianceRecords c ON c.policy_id = a.id WHERE c.status = 'compliant' ORDER BY c.record_date DESC;
